package.json.name: asdf-dat
package.json.description: ASDF DAT - Automated Buyback & Burn System with Random Daily Execution

.env.example:
# ASDF DAT Configuration

# Program ID (update after deployment)
PROGRAM_ID=DATxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# Wallet path
WALLET_PATH=./wallet.json

# Network
NETWORK=mainnet

# RPC URL (optional, defaults to public)
RPC_URL=https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com

# Dashboard
DASHBOARD_PORT=3000

# Alerts (Discord/Slack webhook)
WEBHOOK_URL=

# Logging
LOG_LEVEL=info
Anchor.toml:
[features]
seeds = false
skip-lint = false

[programs.mainnet]
asdf_dat = "DATxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"

[programs.devnet]
asdf_dat = "DATxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"

[registry]
url = "https://api.apr.dev"

[provider]
cluster = "mainnet"
wallet = "./wallet.json"

[scripts]
test = "yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 tests/**/*.ts"

[test]
startup_wait = 5000
Cargo.toml:
[workspace]
members = [
    "programs/*"
]
resolver = "2"

[profile.release]
overflow-checks = true
lto = "fat"
codegen-units = 1
[profile.release.build-override]
opt-level = 3
incremental = false
codegen-units = 1
.gitignore:
# Dependencies
node_modules/
target/
dist/

# Keys
*.json
!package.json
!tsconfig.json
!Anchor.toml

# Environment
.env
!.env.example

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
.DS_Store

# Test
test-ledger/
.anchor/

# Build
*.so
target/
README.md:
# ASDF DAT - Automated Buyback & Burn System

## Overview
Production-ready automated system for ASDF token buyback and burn on Solana.

### Features
- ğŸ² **Random Execution**: 2 buybacks per day at random times (AM/PM)
- ğŸ”¥ **Automatic Burns**: 100% of bought tokens are burned immediately
- ğŸ’° **Fee Collection**: Automatic collection from creator vault
- ğŸ“Š **Web Dashboard**: Real-time monitoring and control
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Robust Error Handling**: Multi-RPC fallback, retry logic
- âš¡ **Gas Optimized**: Efficient transaction management

## Quick Start

### 1. Install Dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

### 2. Setup Wallet
```bash
solana-keygen new --outfile wallet.json
```

### 3. Configure Environment
```bash
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your settings
```

### 4. Build Program
```bash
anchor build
```

### 5. Deploy Program
```bash
anchor deploy
# Update PROGRAM_ID in .env
```

### 6. Initialize DAT
```bash
npm run dat:init
```

### 7. Start Bot
```bash
npm run dat:start
```

### 8. Launch Dashboard
```bash
npm run dashboard
# Open http://localhost:3000
```

## Production Deployment

### Using PM2
```bash
npm install -g pm2
npm run build
pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
pm2 save
pm2 startup
```

## Configuration

- **Min Threshold**: 0.19 SOL
- **Max Per Cycle**: 10 SOL
- **Executions**: 2 random times daily (AM/PM)
- **Slippage**: 1-3% adaptive

## Monitoring

Access dashboard at `http://localhost:3000` for:
- Real-time metrics
- Burn history charts
- Control panel
- Activity logs
- System status
